org.jasig.cas.services

Interface RegisteredServiceAttributeFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegisteredServiceDefaultAttributeFilter, RegisteredServiceRegexAttributeFilter

    public interface RegisteredServiceAttributeFilter
    Defines the general contract of the attribute release policy for a registered service. An instance of this attribute filter may determine how principal/global attributes are translated to a map of attributes that may be released for a registered service.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> filter(String principalId, Map<String,Object> givenAttributes, RegisteredService svc)
      Filters the received principal attributes for the given registered service.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        Map<String,Object> filter(String principalId,
                        Map<String,Object> givenAttributes,
                        RegisteredService svc)
        Filters the received principal attributes for the given registered service.
        Parameters:
        principalId - the principal id for whom attributes are to be released
        givenAttributes - the map for the original given attributes
        svc - the registered service for which attributes are to be released
        Returns:
        a map that contains the filtered attributes.
